1384cfd7-61c0-4ec3-ad82-cff0ede38b62: "I mislaid my favourite flask a few days ago. For the life of me, I cannot imagine where it's got to. I wonder... perhaps one of you purloined it?"
21b964e7-d70e-4cb6-a0de-adda2c65a832: "You left it by the vox operator's station on the bridge. You should reclaim it before the officer is upbraided for drinking at their post."
